question: Who among the following was awarded the IIFTC Tourism Impact Award 2020 during the event of 8th India International Film Tourism Conclave?
explanation: The 8th India International Film Tourism Conclave was organized in Mumbai, Maharashtra. Zoya Akhtar was awarded the IIFTC Tourism Impact Award 2020 during the event. She helped to promote tourism through her movies i.e., ‘Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara’ and ‘Dil Dhadakne Do’.
